original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2361)@</color>  全體我方武將恢復9%最大體力，並在接下來的<color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(1616)@</color>秒內，每兩秒回復110點體力。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2361)@</color> All our generals recover 14% of their maximum stamina, and in the next <color=# ccffcc>$Status_duration(1616)@</color> Within seconds, restore 110 points of stamina every two seconds.
